Html:
first i tried:
node.style = "position:absolute;overflow:hidden;width:100%;height:100%;top:0;left:0";
but it gives this error:
error TS2012: Cannot convert 'string' to 'MSStyleCSSProperties':
Type 'String' is missing property 'pixelWidth' from type 'MSStyleCSSProperties'.
then i tried:
node.setAttribute('style', 'position:absolute;overflow:hidden;width:100%;height:100%;top:0;left:0;border:1px solid black;');
and this worked.
